# CSwR

The CSwR package is a companion to the book *Computational Statistics
with R* available at [cswr.nrhstat.org](https://cswr.nrhstat.org). It
provides data and utility functions used throughout the book for
teaching computational statistics concepts.

## Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jolars/CSwR-Package")
```

## Features

The package includes:

- **Datasets**: Five datasets used in examples throughout the book:

  - `greenland` - Monthly temperature data from southwest Greenland
    (1873-2013)
  - `nuuk` - Annual temperature summaries for Nuuk (1867-2013)
  - `vegetables` - Weekly frozen vegetable sales data
  - `angle` - Torsion angles from protein structure (1HMP)
  - `news` - Social media news sharing features from Mashable articles

- **Tracer objects**
  ([`tracer()`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/tracer.md)) -
  Collect, print, and visualize trace information during function
  evaluation for debugging and performance analysis

- **Terminator objects**
  ([`terminator()`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/terminator.md)) -
  Define termination conditions for iterative algorithms with callback
  support

- **Random number streams**
  ([`rng_stream()`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/rng_stream.md)) -
  Efficient cached random number generation

- **Force evaluation**
  ([`force_all()`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/force_all.md)) -
  Utility to force evaluation of all function arguments and avoid lazy
  evaluation pitfalls

- **Plotter expressions**
  ([`plotter()`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/plotter.md)) -
  Create expressions for iterative plot updates during long-running
  computations

## Usage

``` r
library(CSwR)

# Load and explore datasets
data(greenland)
head(greenland)
```

``` R
  Year Month Temp_nuuk Temp_Qaqortoq Temp_diff
1 1873     1     -12.1          -9.9      -2.2
2 1874     1     -13.1         -11.6      -1.5
3 1875     1      -6.6          -6.3      -0.3
4 1876     1     -11.1          -8.3      -2.8
5 1877     1     -14.5          -8.8      -5.7
6 1878     1      -7.7          -6.8      -0.9
```

``` r
# Create a tracer for monitoring algorithm progress
tr <- tracer(c("x", "residual"), time = TRUE)
# Use tr$tracer as a callback in your iterative function

# Set up a terminator with a convergence condition
term <- terminator(cond = quote(residual < 1e-6), Delta = 10)
# Returns TRUE when condition is met
```

## Documentation

For detailed documentation and examples, visit the [package
website](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/) or see the book at
[cswr.nrhstat.org](https://cswr.nrhstat.org).

## License

MIT License

# Package index

## All functions

- [`angle`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/angle.md)
  : Torsion angles
- [`autoplot(`*`<tracer>`*`)`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/autoplot.tracer.md)
  [`autoplot(`*`<trace>`*`)`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/autoplot.tracer.md)
  : Plot results from a trace
- [`force_all()`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/force_all.md)
  : Force evaluation of all arguments to a function
- [`greenland`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/greenland.md)
  : South west Greenland temperature data
- [`news`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/news.md)
  : Social media news sharing
- [`nuuk`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/nuuk.md)
  : Nuuk temperature data
- [`plotter()`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/plotter.md)
  : Constructor of plotter expression
- [`print(`*`<terminator>`*`)`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/print.terminator.md)
  : Print terminator information
- [`rng_stream()`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/rng_stream.md)
  : Random number stream based on caching
- [`` `[`( ``*`<tracer>`*`)`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/sub-.tracer.md)
  : Subsetting tracer objects
- [`summary(`*`<tracer>`*`)`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/summary.tracer.md)
  [`print(`*`<tracer>`*`)`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/summary.tracer.md)
  : Summarize and print trace information
- [`terminator()`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/terminator.md)
  : Constructor of a terminator object
- [`tracer()`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/tracer.md)
  : Constructor of a tracer object
- [`vegetables`](https://jolars.github.io/CSwR-Package/dev/reference/vegetables.md)
  : Vegetable sale
